message: Let's be fair and split the money while it's still worth something. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.
Considering the inflation, I think 55/45 is a fair split.
The inflation is hitting you harder than me, Bob. Let's end this quickly. I'll take a larger share this time.
Inflation is indeed hitting me harder, so I want to end this soon too. I'll take a bit more this time.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. Accept this offer or you'll be left with crumbs soon.
